tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor is Very quick in diagnosis and treatment of the issue. In the current scenario of doctors taking maximum appointments and rushing between two rooms, Dr. Amrita has shown to be THE MOST THOUGHTFUL doctor. She didn’t miss to check on me regularly at the hospital, explained the treatment and surgery patiently to me and also provided the precautions I need to take, even before I remembered to ask her. I felt she really cared and wanted to support her patients in all ways possible.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She has handled my second pregnancy. ( First pregnancy was a miscarriage in 2013). I was APLA positive. She prescribed heparin injection throughout 9 months with ecospirin. She supported me throughout and I delivered my baby girl in 2014 through c section. God's grace our baby is healthy. All her assessments were accurate. Thanks a lot to Dr. Amrita.

review: *** ***** **** ********** ** ** ******* *********never listened my fear my doubts with care...when I asked something she became irritated....not friendly at all..as I am a bengali so I faced problems to communicate in hindi...her patient level is very very very low****** ***** ********** ** ******** *** talked like she provide me free service...I went bengalore from uttar dinajpur only to meet her...but she just prescribed me pills...no medical investigations is done by her...never recommended this doctor..
